## Conformance namespace

This namespace defines types and functions for working with conformance- related queries.

[https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG/\#conformance](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG/#conformance)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare namespace Conformance 
```

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isA(version)](./alfa-wcag.conformance_namespace.isa_1_function.md) | Check if a criterion is needed for level AA conformance under the specified version. |
|  [isAA(version)](./alfa-wcag.conformance_namespace.isaa_1_function.md) | Check if a criterion is needed for level AA conformance under the specified version. |
|  [isAAA(version)](./alfa-wcag.conformance_namespace.isaaa_1_function.md) | Check if a criterion is needed for level AAA conformance under the specified version. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [A](./alfa-wcag.conformance_namespace.a_typealias.md) | All criteria needed for conformance level A. |
|  [AA](./alfa-wcag.conformance_namespace.aa_typealias.md) | All criteria needed for level AA conformance. |
|  [AAA](./alfa-wcag.conformance_namespace.aaa_typealias.md) | All criteria needed for level AAA conformance. |
